paper_abstract: When analyzing binary files, printable strings are easy to find, but a naive approach yields a large number of false positives: 'uninteresting' string-like sequences that occur by chance in the binary. We present a lightweight yet surprisingly effective method of filtering printable strings for English or English-like sequences. Copyright (C) 2015 John Wiley & Sons Ltd.
paper_title: Stringlish: improved English string searching in binary files
